channel.description: Weekly sermons and other content from Creekside Church of Christ in Valrico, Florida

item.title: Reliable Testimonials That Prove theResurrection of Jesus Christ - Mar 31st, 2024
item.description: Explore the undeniable evidence of Jesus' Resurrection through the transformative testimonies of Paul, James, and John. This sermon weaves together nature's rebirth, historical facts, and personal stories to reveal the power of the risen Christ. Discover how the Resurrection changes everything and invites us to believe and proclaim the good news with joy and conviction. Join us as we delve into the heart of Christian faith and witness the undeniable proof of Jesus' victory over death. https://creekside.life
item.itunes:author: Creekside Church of Christ

item.title: Finding My Purpose In The Lord - Sunday Evening Service - Mar 24th, 2024
item.description: Discover the pathway to finding your purpose in the Lord with this enlightening sermon. Explore how trust, delight, commitment, representation, and patience are not just virtues but steps ordered by God to guide us to our true calling. Learn from biblical wisdom, practical insights, and inspiring stories that reveal the beauty of living a purpose-driven life anchored in faith. Whether you're seeking direction, affirmation, or a deeper understanding of your spiritual journey, this message offers a clear, scriptural foundation to find your purpose in the embrace of the Lord's will. https://creekside.life

item.title: Inherited Tendencies of the Knowledge of Good and Evil - Sunday Morning Service - Mar 24th, 2024
item.description: Explore the profound truths behind our inherited tendencies towards sin and the transformative hope found in Jesus Christ. This sermon delves into the biblical narrative, from the Fall in Genesis to the redemption offered through Christ's sacrifice, providing a deep understanding of sin's impact and the path to salvation. Discover how the knowledge of good and evil shapes us, the role of Jesus in our redemption, and the importance of personal responsibility and faith. Join us on a journey through Scripture to find hope and grace in the good news of Jesus Christ. https://creekside.life
item.itunes:author: Creekside Church of Christ

item.title: Finding My Purpose in God's Manifestations - Sunday Evening Service - Mar 17th, 2024
item.description: Delve into the significance of our daily actions and learn how even the smallest tasks can align with our divine calling. Discover the impact of historical figures like William Osler and Albert Einstein on understanding our purpose, all through a blend of humor, historical anecdotes, and Scripture. Whether you're seeking guidance on finding your purpose or looking to deepen your spiritual journey, this message offers invaluable insights into living a purpose-driven life. Join us as we uncover how to fully embrace and manifest God's purpose for us, making every moment count. https://creekside.life

item.title: Five Steps of Spiritual Growth for a Disciple or an Apprentice of Christ - Mar 17th, 2024
item.description: Explore the transformative journey of becoming a disciple of Christ with our latest sermon, "Five Steps of Spiritual Growth for a Disciple or an Apprentice of Christ." Delve into the essential stages every believer embarks on, from being sanctified as a Saint to serving with humility, embracing lifelong learning as a Student, enduring as a Sufferer, and finally, empowering others as a Sender. Uncover how these steps guide us closer to embodying Christ's teachings in our daily lives, illustrating that discipleship is not just about knowledge or skills, but about becoming a reflection of Christ to the world. Join us to discover how you can embark on this spiritual journey, fostering a deeper, more meaningful connection with Christ and those around you. https://creekside.life

item.title: Finding My Purpose In God’s Purpose - Sunday Evening Service - Mar 10th, 2024
item.description: Through the wisdom of Romans 8:28-29 and engaging anecdotes, discover the joy and fulfillment in embracing God's call, love, and predestination. Unveil the steps towards being conformed to the image of Christ and how this shapes our ultimate joy and purpose in life. Whether you're seeking direction, affirmation, or a deeper understanding of your spiritual journey, this message offers valuable insights into finding your unique place in God's grand narrative. https://creekside.life

item.title: The True Teachings of Christ in Practice - Sunday Morning Service - Mar 10th, 2024
item.description: Discover how Christ's emphasis on practice over theory guides us towards making small, meaningful adjustments in our lives. Inspired by the real-life story of Play-Doh's invention, this sermon beautifully illustrates how we're all just one small adjustment away from aligning our lives more closely with Christ's teachings. From being misjudged to misguided, and misbehaving, learn how to see through Christ's eyes and become His apprentice in the way of love, kindness, and righteousness. Whether you're looking to deepen your faith or find practical ways to live out Christ's teachings every day, this sermon offers wisdom and insight for everyone. https://creekside.life

item.title: Finding My Purpose In God’s Thoughts - Sunday Evening Service - Mar 3rd, 2024
item.description: Dive into the heart of finding your purpose through God's lens with our latest sermon, "Finding My Purpose In God’s Thoughts." Unpack the profound truths hidden within Jeremiah 29:11-14, as we explore how God's plans, peace, and purpose shape our lives. Through engaging stories, biblical insights, and a touch of humor, this message invites you on a journey to deeper understanding and fulfillment. Discover how aligning with God's thoughts can transform your perspective on life's purpose. Join us for an enlightening exploration of finding true meaning and direction in the divine plans God has for each of us. https://creekside.life

item.title: Saul’s Path to Being Rejected and Replaced - Sunday Morning Service - Mar 3rd, 2024
item.description: Explore the riveting story of King Saul's rise and fall in "Saul’s Path to Being Rejected and Replaced". This sermon delves into the biblical narrative of 1 Samuel, offering profound insights into the dangers of disobedience, the deceitfulness of appearances, and the devastating consequences of losing God's presence. Through Saul's journey, learn the critical importance of spiritual integrity and the hope of redemption through obedience to God. Join us as we uncover the lessons Saul's story holds for personal growth and spiritual renewal. https://creekside.life

item.title: Keeping Worship Special - Sunday Evening Service - Feb 18th, 2024
item.description: Explore the sacredness of worship in 'Keeping Worship Special,' a sermon that delves into the biblical significance of worship as a unique and holy experience. Through the metaphor of smell and a touching modern-day story, this message invites us to reflect on how we approach worship, encouraging us to create a special, sensory, and sacred space that honors God. Discover how ancient practices can guide our worship today, making it a pleasing aroma to the Lord. This sermon reminds us of the importance of respecting and cherishing our worship experiences, drawing closer to God with every breath. https://creekside.life

item.title: One Receives The Prize! - Sunday Morning Service - Feb 25th, 2024
item.description: Explore the depths of your purpose with 'One Receives The Prize!' – a compelling journey through scripture that challenges us to live a life glorifying God. Discover the essential elements of realization, restraint, resolve, and rules through a diverse array of biblical passages. This sermon will guide you towards understanding your life's ultimate goal: to honor God in all you do. Whether you're seeking direction or inspiration to elevate your spiritual journey, this message offers valuable insights into achieving a purpose-driven life that aligns with God's glory. Join us as we delve into a transformative exploration of faith, purpose, and the pursuit of an imperishable crown. https://creekside.life

item.title: Coping With Our Fears 3 - Sunday Evening Service - Feb 18th, 2024
item.description: Welcome to the third part of our transformative sermon series, "Coping with Our Fears," where we explore the dynamic role of faith in addressing the anxieties that challenge us daily. In this segment, we delve into the power of scripture, drawing from Philippians 4:6-7 and other pivotal verses, to present humor-filled, relatable narratives alongside deep spiritual insights. Learn about the four pillars of coping with anxiety through faith: prayer, peace, protection, and the power of God. We dissect common fears with practical examples—ranging from humorous hypotheticals to everyday worries—showcasing how these concerns often hold less substance than we might think. This sermon offers an in-depth look at the unnecessary nature of most anxieties and provides biblical strategies for shifting our focus from fear to faith. Highlighting the significance of prayer, the peace that comes from trusting God, the protection offered by faith, and the strength found in Christ, we're guided on how to transform our approach to life's uncertainties. https://creekside.life

item.title: Excessive Church of Christ Fears - Sunday Morning Service - Feb 18th, 2024
item.description: Dive into an enlightening journey as we explore "Excessive Church of Christ Fears" in our latest sermon. Discover how common fears among believers, from financial loss to the dread of judgment day, can be overcome through faith, scriptural wisdom, and the transformative power of God's love. With engaging anecdotes, historical insights, and a deep dive into the Scriptures, this sermon offers a comforting perspective on facing our fears with courage and trust in the Lord. Join us for a faith-affirming session that promises to uplift and inspire. https://creekside.life

item.title: Coping With Our Fears 2 - Sunday Evening Service - Feb 11th, 2024
item.description: Discover how scriptures like Isaiah 41:10 and 2 Timothy 1:7 guide us towards a sound mind, love, and power over fear. From personal anecdotes to divine truths, learn how faith in God's presence, godliness, helpfulness, and righteousness can transform fear into faithfulness. Whether it's fear of the unknown or everyday anxieties, this sermon offers insights for anyone looking to find peace and courage through their faith. https://creekside.life

item.title: Double Trouble - Sunday Morning Service - Feb 11th, 2024
item.description: Explore the powerful theme of 'Double Trouble' in this enlightening sermon, as we delve into biblical stories of curses and blessings to uncover the dangers of duplicity in faith. Discover how ancient narratives and modern-day distractions reveal the importance of a single-minded devotion to God. Learn practical steps to avoid the pitfalls of being double-hearted, double-minded, and double-tongued, and how to embrace a life of focused faithfulness. Join us on a journey from the perils of divided loyalty to the peace of unwavering commitment to what is right and true. https://creekside.life

item.title: Coping With Our Fears - Sunday Evening Service - Feb 4th, 2024
item.description: Explore the depths of faith and fear with our enlightening sermon "Coping With Our Fears." Delve into how understanding God's promises, presence, and purposes provides us with the strength to face our darkest fears. From personal stories across the globe to the wisdom of Psalms and the insightful experiments of Curt Paul Richter, this sermon offers hope and guidance for navigating the valleys of life. Discover how to anchor your soul in hope and emerge fearless, no matter the challenges. Join us on this transformative journey to overcoming fear with faith. https://creekside.life

item.title: How to Incline My Heart to Obey God Forever - Sunday Morning Service - Feb 4th, 2024
item.description: Discover the transformative journey of inclining your heart to obey God forever in our latest sermon. Drawing inspiration from Psalm 119:112-116, we explore the profound shift from performing religious duties to embodying a spirit of true obedience and devotion. Learn how to cultivate a deep-seated aversion to spiritual instability, find solace and protection in the Lord, and place unwavering hope in His Word. Join us as we navigate through the three key inclinations that can transform your relationship with God: hating all forms of instability, hiding in the Lord during times of trouble, and hoping in God's Word as the ultimate source of truth and salvation. This sermon is not just about what we do but about who we are inclined to be in the Spirit. Subscribe for more uplifting messages and join us in exploring the depths of faith, hope, and love in our spiritual walk with God. https://creekside.life

item.itunes:summary: Discover the transformative journey of inclining your heart to obey God forever in our latest sermon. Drawing inspiration from Psalm 119:112-116, we explore the profound shift from performing religious duties to embodying a spirit of true obedience and devotion. Learn how to cultivate a deep-seated aversion to spiritual instability, find solace and protection in the Lord, and place unwavering hope in His Word. Join us as we navigate through the three key inclinations that can transform your relationship with God: hating all forms of instability, hiding in the Lord during times of trouble, and hoping in God's Word as the ultimate source of truth and salvation. This sermon is not just about what we do but about who we are inclined to be in the Spirit. Subscribe for more uplifting messages and join us in exploring the depths of faith, hope, and love in our spiritual walk with God. https://creekside.life

item.title: What We Must Remember Part 3: We Must Remember Purity - Sunday Evening - Jan 21st, 2024
item.description: Explore the essence of spiritual purity in 'What We Must Remember Part 3: Remember Purity'. Delve into a thought-provoking journey through Revelation 3:1-6 and other key Scriptures, discovering how to maintain purity in a challenging world. Laugh, reflect, and grow with an unforgettable illustration about three boys and their dads. Join us in understanding how purity isn't just about the flesh but encompasses our whole being, as we seek to live worthy lives before God. https://creekside.life
